title: House for sale in Kalutata
details:
* Single story 3 bedroom house for sale ( selling with or without furniture ), 2 washrooms, 15 perches land, 2000 Sq, A/C, hot water, pantry, maids quarters, 100 meters to galle road.

* Price- 14 million, selling for highest offer.

* Inspection only through Appointment! Brokers will not be entertained!
